rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with space for shoes and storage.
Open living space adjoining the courtyard, suitable for Mediterranean style furniture and decor.
Modern kitchen with integrated storage and counter space, following local building norms.
A landscaped courtyard providing natural light and ventilation, aligning with Vastu principles.
Quiet reading space with built-in shelves and ample seating.
Functional living area for staff with basic amenities.
